charges.charge_description: 18:228.F  FAILURE TO PAY CHILD SUPPORT (2ND OFFENSE)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Probation: 3 years; Mandatory drug testing requirements are waived; Special conditions of probation: Deft. shall be prohibited from incurring new credit charges, opening additional lines of credit and shall provide probation access to any requested financial information. Deft. does not need to participate in the collection of DNA. Fine: Waived; Special assessment: $100.00; Restitution: $82,225.13 payable to Melissa Norris at the rate of $200.00 per month
